mapper.select: select a.id, a.name, a.content, b.type, concat(c.layout_type, a.episodes, '集') layout, c.layout_type layoutType, a.episodes, a.dimensional, d.sex_limit sexLimit, a.status from ((hanime_main a left join hanime_type b on a.type = b.id) left join anime_layout_type c on a.layout_type = c.id) left join anime_sexlimit d on a.sex_limit = d.id where a.id = #{id} and a.deleted = 0 and b.deleted = 0 and c.deleted = 0 and d.deleted = 0
mapper.insert: insert into hanime_main(name, content, type, layout_type, episodes, dimensional, sex_limit, status, deleted) values ( #{name}, #{content}, #{type}, #{layoutType}, #{episodes}, #{dimensional} , #{sexLimit}, #{status}, 0)
mapper.update:
update hanime_main a
a.name = #{name},
a.content = #{content},
a.type = #{type},
a.layout_type = #{layoutType},
a.episodes = #{episodes},
a.dimensional = #{dimensional},
a.sex_limit = #{sexLimit},
a.status = #{status},
where id = #{id} and deleted = 0;
